name: vscode-symfony-ux-twig-component
description: References, highlights, and formats Twig components for Symfony UX

symfony-ux-twig-component.enabled.description: Enable or disable the Twig component extension.

symfony-ux-twig-component.formattingStyl.description: The formatting style to use for Twig components. 'multiline' puts attributes on separate lines, 'singleLine' keeps everything on one line.

symfony-ux-twig-component.componentPaths.description: Configuration for component paths. Can be an array of base paths or an object with detailed configuration.

phpBasePaths.description: Base paths for PHP component files.

phpComponentPaths.description: Path patterns for PHP component files.

twigBasePaths.description: Base paths for Twig template files.

twigTemplatePaths.description: Path patterns for Twig template files.

excludedDirectoryNames.description: Directory names to exclude when parsing namespaces.

fallbackTemplateDirs.description: Fallback template directories to search in when no template is found using the standard patterns.

symfony-ux-twig-component.phpBasePaths.description: Base paths for PHP component files. The extension will search for PHP component files in these directories.

symfony-ux-twig-component.phpComponentPa.description: Path patterns for PHP component files. The extension will search for PHP component files using these patterns.

symfony-ux-twig-component.twigBasePaths.description: Base paths for Twig template files. The extension will search for Twig template files in these directories.

symfony-ux-twig-component.twigTemplatePa.description: Path patterns for Twig template files. The extension will search for Twig template files using these patterns.

symfony-ux-twig-component.excludedDirect.description: Directory names to exclude when parsing namespaces.

symfony-ux-twig-component.fallbackTempla.description: Fallback template directories to search in when no template is found using the standard patterns.

symfony-ux-twig-component.debug.description: Enable debug logging for the extension.

symfony-ux-twig-component.runLast.description: Run the formatter last, after other formatters have run. This helps prevent other formatters from overriding the Twig component formatting.

symfony-ux-twig-component.timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds to wait before running the formatter after a document change or save.

symfony-ux-twig-component.maxLineLength.description: Maximum line length for single-line components. Components with a single attribute will be kept on one line if the total length is less than this value.

symfony-ux-twig-component.minAttributesM.description: Minimum number of attributes required to format a component with multiple lines. Components with fewer attributes will be kept on one line if the total length is less than maxLineLength.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
